variable.name: SIDE
variable.description: Side of brain in which CVA was observed
variable.comment: For scans for which no CVA was observed (CVA_NUM=0), SIDE is coded as . = unknown

variable.name: SIZE
variable.comment: For scans for which no CVA was observed (CVA_NUM=0), SIZE is coded as . = unknown

variable.name: CVA_NUM
variable.comment: There is 1 record for each observed CVA and the multiple records are numbered sequentially by CVA_NUM, starting with CVA_NUM=1
variable.value: No CVA observed at time of scan

variable.name: CVA_LOC
variable.description: Brain region where CVA was observed
variable.comment: For scans for which no CVA was observed (CVA_NUM=0), CVA_LOC is coded as . = unknown

variable.name: CVA_TYPE
variable.comment: For scans for which no CVA was observed (CVA_NUM=0), CVA_TYPE is coded as . = unknown

variable.name: mri_date
variable.comment: MRI_DATE modified - Number of days since Exam 1
